me.description: I am currently pursuing a dual degree in Computer Science and Engineering, alongside Mining Engineering, at the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) Dhanbad. With a strong passion for research, I am particularly focused on applying advanced machine learning algorithms to address emerging challenges in medical and mechanical sciences. My academic journey has equipped me with a deep understanding of computational methods, including specialized experience in Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations, which I aim to leverage in solving real-world, complex problems at the intersection of these fields.
